user_query: I'm planning a surprise baby shower for my sister. Can you help me find a professional event planner who specializes in baby showers? I also need to order decorations and party supplies. Can you recommend an online store that offers a wide range of baby shower products? Lastly, I want to create a personalized playlist for the party. Can you suggest some popular baby shower songs?

TaskList.description: Find a list of professional event planners who specialize in baby showers.
Order decorations and party supplies from an online store that has a wide range of baby shower products.
Create a personalized playlist of popular baby shower songs.
